content.demo-explain: In this demo you can create a new token on the block chain, grant tokens (points) at the store, and confirm point usage.

err-no-token-account.title: Unregistered account
err-no-token-account.msg:
No demo token creator account exists. 
Create an account and save it to local storage.

err-no-token-account-env.title: Environment preparation
err-no-token-account-env.msg:
Demo token is not created.
To transition to token page.

err-no-store.title: Unregistered member store
err-no-store.msg:
No demo merchants exist.
Please register a member store.

err-no-account.title: Unregistered account
err-no-account.msg:
No demo token creator account exists. 
Create an account and save it to local storage.

err-token-name-too-long.title: Input error
err-token-name-too-long.msg: The token name must be 32 bytes or less.

err-no-terminal-selected.title: Terminal selection error
err-no-terminal-selected.msg: Please select a deletion target terminal.

err-no-balance-to-liquidate.title: No balance
err-no-balance-to-liquidate.msg: There is no balance to be settled.

err-invalid-max-liabilities.title: Max liabilities input invalid
err-invalid-max-liabilities.msg: Please enter a positive numeric upper bound.

err-no-get-amount.title: Input value error
err-no-get-amount.msg: Please enter a positive number for the number of token assignments.

err-no-use-amount.title: Input value error
err-no-use-amount.msg: Please enter a positive number for token consumption.

err-no-user-account.title: Unregistered end user accounts
err-no-user-account.msg:
No demo end user account exists. 
This generates multiple demo end user accounts and saves them to local storage.
